mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POLL_MASTER (POLL_MASTER_ID, POLL_NAME, POLL_START_DATE, POLL_END_DATE, POLL_DESC, POLL_LAST_NAME, POLL_GENDER, POLL_RESULTS_VIEW) VALUES (#{pollMasterId}, #{pollName}, #{pollStartDate}, #{pollEndDate}, #{pollDesc}, #{pollLastName}, #{pollGender}, #{pollResultsView})
INSERT INTO POLL_DETAIL (POLL_DETAIL_ID, POLL_MASTER_ID, POLL_ITEM, POLL_ITEM_DESC, POLL_ITEM_COUNT) VALUES (#{pollDetailId}, #{pollMasterId}, #{pollItem}, #{pollItemDesc}, #{pollItemCount})
mapper.select: SELECT POLL_MASTER_ID, POLL_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(POLL_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS POLL_START_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(POLL_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS POLL_END_DATE, POLL_DESC, POLL_LAST_NAME, CASE WHEN POLL_GENDER = 'M' THEN '남' WHEN POLL_GENDER = 'F' THEN '여' WHEN POLL_GENDER = 'NONE' THEN '무관' ELSE '알수없음' END AS POLL_GENDER, POLL_RESULTS_VIEW FROM POLL_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND POLL_MASTER_ID = #{pollMasterId};

SELECT POLL_DETAIL_ID, POLL_MASTER_ID, POLL_ITEM, POLL_ITEM_DESC, POLL_ITEM_COUNT, SUM(POLL_ITEM_COUNT) OVER () TOTAL_POLL_ITEM_COUNT, CASE WHEN (SUM(POLL_ITEM_COUNT) OVER ()) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(POLL_ITEM_COUNT / (SUM(POLL_ITEM_COUNT) OVER ()) * 100, 0) END AS POLL_ITEM_COUNT_RATE FROM POLL_DETAIL WHERE 1=1 AND POLL_MASTER_ID = #{pollMasterId} ORDER BY POLL_ITEM_COUNT DESC;
